citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 AM on
05/19/15.
Spoke with the licensee via cell phone. No one was available for inspection due to work schedules. The licensee
will email with days and hours of availability.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.

05/19/15.
Spoke with the licensee via cell phone.  No one was available for inspection due to work schedules.  The licensee
will email with days and hours of availability.
